ACACIA

Astounding apartment complex at Dubai Hills Estate

About

Serene and peaceful neighborhood in one of the
most prestigious communities - Dubai Hills Estate, combined with high-class amenities form the uniqueness of this multiple storey residential complex.

Residential units

 

We focus on key
features of comfort

01

Swimming pools

Spacious swimming area with temperature-controlled water.

02

Restaurants and cafes

Welcoming and luxurious venues offer rich menus and impeccable comfort.

03

Event space

A multi-purpose hall for special occasions and social gatherings.

04

Fitness centre

Well-equipped gyms and many other facilities for residents’ wellness.

05

Spa and sauna

High-class service will provide you with quality self-care time.

06

Kids’ play areas

State-of-the-art fun-in-motion activities for families and children.

About Dubai Hills Estate

Elite location, which gives access to luscious landscaped greens and pristine fairways with an iconic backdrop of the Burj Khalifa and the Dubai skyline. The 2700-acre multi-purpose development includes high-class amenities and infrastructure such as schools, hospitals, parks, malls and even 18-hole Championship golf course.
